verbose_text: Levosimendan, a calcium sensitizer and phosphodiesterase-3 inhibitor, enhances cardiac contractility without increasing myocardial oxygen demand, but it may result in systemic and pulmonary vasodilation [XREF_BIBR] and atrial arrhythmias.
evidence: calcium sensitizer and phosphodiesterase-3 inhibitor, enhances cardiac contractility without increasing myocardial oxygen
